person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: I hear you! Stress can really cloud focus. There’s a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds great! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will teach you some wonderful relaxation techniques to help you unwind. Let’s go find him!
